nodes.text: Qotile was a location in the galaxy. Considered a desolate wasteland, it was ruled by a masked monarch. Sometime prior to the Battle of Hoth, the bounty on this ruler's head was claimed by Trandoshan bounty hunter Bossk, who then assumed the title of ruler of Qotile. He later used this episode as an example of his bounty hunting prowess to his sister Doshanalawook, alias "Chainbreaker", though she pointed out that, due to Qotile's barren landscape, Bossk's seizure of the monarchy was in vain.

Qotile first originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where the Qotile system—and Bossk's association with it—was mentioned in the Star Wars 67 comic from 1982, written by David Michelinie. The planet Qotile, whose surface was devastated by the Stark Hyperspace War, was first specifically mentioned in the Legends The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia. In canon, Qotile was first mentioned in "Tooth and Claw," a short story written by Michael Kogge and published in From a Certain Point of View: The Empire Strikes Back in 2020.
